parameters.query:
SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_leads,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'comprou' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_compras,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'comprou' THEN valor ELSE 0 END) AS total_faturado,
    AVG(CASE WHEN status = 'comprou' THEN valor ELSE NULL END) AS ticket_medio,
    (SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'comprou' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)) AS taxa_conversao
FROM 
    leads
WHERE
    date_trunc('month', created_at) = date_trunc('month', NOW());

=SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_leads,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'comprou' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_compras,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'comprou' THEN valor ELSE 0 END) AS total_faturado,
    AVG(CASE WHEN status = 'comprou' THEN valor ELSE NULL END) AS ticket_medio,
    (SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'comprou' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)) AS taxa_conversao
FROM 
    leads
WHERE
    created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '{{$node["Webhook (GET)"].json.query.range === '30d' ? '30' : '7'}} days';
